item.title: Renee add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "This is my simple religion. No need for temples. No need for complicated philosophy. Your own mind, your own heart is the temple. Your philosophy is simple kindness." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Renee add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Live and act within the limit of your knowledge and keep expanding it to the limit of your life." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Renee add a quote by George Gordon Byron
Renee add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "I swear by my life and my love of it that I will never live for the sake of another man, nor ask another man to live for mine." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Renee add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "The strip of earthy, faintly visible outside the window, was running faster now, blending into a gray stream. Through the dry phrases of calculations in her mind, she noticed that she did have time to feel something: it was the hard, exhilarating pleasure of action." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Renee add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?" -- Richard Bach

item.title: Renee add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "When we blindly adopt a religion, a political system, a literary dogma, we become automatons." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Renee add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "If you hate a person, you hate something in him that is part of yourself. What isn't part of ourselves doesn't disturb us." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Renee add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Deserves it! I daresay he does. Many that live deserve death. And some that die deserve life. Can you give it to them? Then do not be too eager to deal out death in judgement. For even the very wise cannot see all ends." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Renee add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Love is our response to our highest values, and can be nothing else." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Renee add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Great men exist that there may be greater men." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Renee add a quote by Dorothy Gambrell
item.description: "If television's a babysitter, the Internet is a drunk librarian who won't shut up." -- Dorothy Gambrell
